if (this.model.get('property') == 'max-width') {
  console.log(this.model.cid, ': setValue ', this.model.get('property'),' valueNow: ', this.model.get('value'), ' valueComp: ', this.componentValue, 'Input ', this.$input && this.$input.get(0));
}

// Add fadeIn effect on add of the new component
editor.on('add:component', function(model) {
  var elStyle = model.view.el.style;
  elStyle.display = 'none';
  elStyle.opacity = 0;
  model.view.$el.slideDown(400)
    .animate( { opacity: 1 }, {
        queue: false,
        duration: 400,
        complete: function () {
          elStyle.opacity = '';
        }
      }
    );
});

// Custom inputs
<!--<script src="https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/Qwya5M4URvK9bUDszu39" data-rel="jquery-1.11.2"></script>-->

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/cash/1.3.0/cash.min.js" data-rel="jquery-1.11.2"></script>

-Custom scrollbars

<div data-helper="1" class="scrollbar-track">scrollbar-track</div>
<div data-helper="1" class="scrollbar-thumb">scrollbar-thumb</div>
<div data-helper="1" class="scrollbar">scrollbar</div>

div[data-helper] {
  height: 100px;
}
.scrollbar-track,
* ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background-color: red;
}
.scrollbar-thumb,
* ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: blue;
}
.scrollbar,
* ::-webkit-scrollbar
{
  width: 20px;
}

// Listen storage
editor.on('storage:load', function(obj) {
  console.log('loaded ', obj, 'from', editor.StorageManager.getCurrent());
});
editor.on('storage:store', function(obj) {
  console.log('stored ', obj, 'to', editor.StorageManager.getCurrent());
});


Accordion blocks #446 (or styles)
```js
const categories = editor.BlockManager.getCategories();
// const categories = editor.StyleManager.getSectors();
categories.each(category => {
	category.set('open', false).on('change:open', opened => {
		opened.get('open') && categories.each(category => {
            category !== opened && category.set('open', false)
        })
	})
})
```
